title: We're back, and we’d love your ideas!
description:
We'll be returning in March with Season Two of Open for Business, and we'd love to hear what you want us to cover. Visit ofblistener.com to share your thoughts. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: eBay / Gimlet Creative
itunes:subtitle: We’re coming back for a season two, and we need your help!
